description:
Toyotomi Hideyoshi takes on Chosokabe`s seafaring fortress, the Fugaku. Meanwhile, Sanada is compelled to stray from his mission once again, and Keiji reunites with his aunt and uncle in Kaga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoui no Toyotomi-Mouri Doumei! Unabara o Saku Ha no Gouken!!
The Menacing Toyotomi-Mori Alliance! The Powerful Fist of Supremacy Cleaves the Sea!
脅威の豊臣・毛利同盟! 海原を裂く覇の豪拳!!
